author: kaz
msg: As I was reworking a lot of the documentation the past few days, I've
come across some little nuggets of information that might not stick out
in the docs until an error is encountered.  So, rather than let these
little nuggets lay buried, I created the start of an FAQ.

author: kaz
msg: Major rework of the Integration document.  All of this work is aimed at
making the entire process easier for the newcomer.  I've been trying
very hard to make this site's document feel like its integrated rather
than a bunch of disparate docs thrown up on a site.

author: kaz
msg: Updated the description of the integration document to reflect the new
changes in documentation (example project descriptor and example maven
delegators have been moved into the integration document).

author: kaz
msg: Lots of changes:
- Removed the old list of properties that were described in this
document and used those as the basis of the new properties document.
- Added documentation regarding the new maven:maven-update target
- Updated the iutest documentation because all properties are now
defined in a separate document.
- Added documentation for the check-source task (Checkstyle stuff).
- Other changes that I can't remember.  :-)

author: kaz
msg: Revised the document to clearly indicate what is expected of Maven vs
what is generated of Maven.  Also added new information with regards to
the new Checkstyle stuff that was added.
